post/2022/How About a Tumblelog

summary
date

2022-05-03

note/2022
posse

Thanks to Twitter turbulence, folks are rediscovering the joys of blogging. I’ve got a blog — this site right here — so I thought I’d try a tumblelog instead. Mixing Org Mode journaling and ox-hugo for the next evolution of this site’s Notes experiment.

There will be more to say about it later when I get home from vacation. For now, just look and enjoy my attempts to amuse myself:
